name: Dawnbringer - A GBstudio game
description:
Your father has been corrupted by a dark sword! Now you must go through platforming, shoot em up',  top down adventure and turn based RPG segments in order to defeat your father, rescue your girlfriend, and vanquish a primordial evil!

Gameboy emporium - House objects - Npc's and enemies - https://parabellum-games.itch.io/gb-studio-character-pack "Sprite sheets and character sheets by Parabellum Games under public license (CC BY 4.0), background pixels slightly modified, available at https://parabellum-games.itch.io"

"Sprite sheets by Rafagars under public license (CC BY 4.0), background pixels slightly modified." “Rafagars.” Itch.io, https://rafagars.itch.io/."

"Sound Effects by Coffee 'Valen' Bat"

Music files

" Music files by Victor Valdez, under public license (CC BY 4.0), available at https://itch.io/profile/victorvaldez"

Some spritework and inspiration "@Zafirot#7803" on Discord

And a special shoutout to the Nishimura discord server "https://discord.gg/ECyPeHuJJn"
